message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a real steal!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $130?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to pay more than $100 for this product. Thank you for understanding.
